android.content.res

Class XResources.XTypedArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.res.TypedArray
      • android.content.res.XResources.XTypedArray
  • Enclosing class:
    XResources

    public class XResources.XTypedArray
extends android.content.res.TypedArray
    TypedArray replacement that replaces values on-the-fly. Mainly used when inflating layouts.
